description: Lentils stand in for meat in this flavor-packed vegan Cincinnati chili! Serve over pasta with a sprinkling of onion and optional vegan cheese shreds for a delicious meal that comes together in under an hour.
name: Lentil Cincinnati Chili
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil (or any cooking oil you have on hand)
1 medium yellow onion, (chopped (reserve a few tablespoons for garnish, if desired)
8 ounces dry whole wheat spaghetti, (cooked according to package directions)
Chopped onion and (vegan shredded cheese, for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook for about 3 minutes, or until softened, stirring often. Add chili powder through cloves; stir to coat and cook for 1 minute, or until fragrant.

Add the broth, tomato sauce, lentils, vinegar, and bay leaf. Bring to boil, then reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer partially covered for 30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender but not falling apart, stirring frequently.
Divide the spaghetti into four bowls and ladle the chili on top. Serve with cheese and onions, if desired.
